MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the EH14 postcode area of Balerno affecting properties in Newmills Street and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers are on site and in order to complete repairs, we have had to to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5:15pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:52pm on 4th December 2020.
